channel.title: Whilst Making a Server... [Question]
channel.description:
[center][u][b]Hey and welcome to my thread[/b][/u][/center]
I just had a question sticking in my head and I thought I'd see what you guys thought about it and what you're answers are. :)
You can post in this format (much easier for me and others to read) or you can just simply post you're answer.
[code][b]Q : Whilst making a server, do you think it's better to have more in-game experience aswell as coding experience? [/b]
[i]A : [ANSWER HERE] [/i][/code]
[b]Q : Whilst making a server, do you think it's advantageous (usefull) to have more in-game experience aswell as coding experience?[/b]
[i]A : Personally, I do. I think it's just as important as coding experience, it helps sort shops out, NPC drops, where to spawn NPC's, cool places etc.[/i]
That was my answer. Give me yours! :rolleyes:

item.title: Whilst Making a Server... [Question]
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

[i]A : Well, without being able to Code java, you're not going to get anywhere with a private server, as I and I'm sure many people have found in past times. However, without in-game experience you don't know any items, equipment or anything about the stats I'd say you need 70% Java coding experience and 30% In-game experience. [/i]

Agreed. I honestly think it’s a big factor in being able to code RS2 Private Server’s.

egor42:

My answer : More coding experience and harder experience in-game + slow cash not more than 100m in 1 hour + more cool areas

I don’t really understand what you mean. Use the layout and I’ll maybe understand. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Whilst Making a Server... [Question]
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

Q : Whilst making a server, do you think it’s better to have more in-game experience aswell as coding experience?

A : Well, without being able to Code java, you’re not going to get anywhere with a private server, as I and I’m sure many people have found in past times. However, without in-game experience you don’t know any items, equipment or anything about the stats I’d say you need 70% Java coding experience and 30% In-game experience.

Read full topic

item.title: Whilst Making a Server... [Question]
item.dc:creator: @egor42 egor42
item.description:
@egor42 wrote:

If you know about more coding then you can faster make cool things

My answer : More coding experience and harder experience in-game + slow cash not more than 100m in 1 hour + more cool areas

^^ Noober :D^^

Read full topic

item.description:

[center]Hey and welcome to my thread[/center]

I just had a question sticking in my head and I thought I’d see what you guys thought about it and what you’re answers are.

You can post in this format (much easier for me and others to read) or you can just simply post you’re answer.

A : [ANSWER HERE] [/code]

Q : Whilst making a server, do you think it’s advantageous (usefull) to have more in-game experience aswell as coding experience?
